{{Infobox football tournament season | title = Copa del Rey | year = 1928 | other_title = | image = | imagesize = | caption = | country = Spain | num_teams = | defending champions = | champions = | runner-up = | matches = | goals = | top goal scorer = | player = | prevseason = [[Copa del Rey 1927|1927]] | nextseason = [[1928-29 Copa del Rey|1929]] }} The '''Copa del Rey 1928''' is the 26th staging of the [[Copa del Rey]]. The competition started on January 31, 1928 and concluded on June 29, 1928 with the 2nd Final Tiebreaker, held at the [[Estadio El Sardinero]] in [[Santander, Cantabria|Santander]]. ==1st Round==
